fields.description: As a cloud user, I want a view of a single volume that will size well to different devices and show me information in a clear, easy to understand modeless view.

comments.body: [~dkavanagh], after you do code review on this, can you please reassign it to me for UX review? I'll need to review it prior to it going to QA. Thanks!

detail page lacks creation time.  Since some values cannot be changed, why show them in a disabled select widget? I think that'll only lead to confusion. Some comments about tags (which I made in GUI-63) apply here as well.

Looking in koala/templates/volumes/volume_view.pt, I don't think the help text is being translated.

Should show instance name (as well as id) for attached volumes.
It also bothers me that we show values in selection boxes when they aren't editable. Plus there is a "create from snapshot" field which is totally meaningless. If this is just an info page, let's show just the info and not try to re-use the creation page. (applies in a lot of places really)
[~dkavanagh]: We can display just the info for fields that aren't editable.  See the Security Groups detail page for an example (recently updated to replace disabled fields with just the info).

* Gear dropdown next to status is too easy to miss. I think this needs to say "Actions" instead. Can we make that look like a regular dropdown menu instead of a button with the options looking like tooltips?
* help should not show by default, only on request (please talk to Jenny for ways to make this work)
* name should be main indicator, not ID (currently ID is shown with name in parens), should just show name if available, ID in data area.
* lots of params missing. Detail page should show *all* details.

Previous comments not addressed. Additionally, delete volume should be on the landing page, not the individual page, and the header that says "<settings for <X>" should not be there. Please fix these things before moving back into in review.
Just a note that we decided to keep delete on the landing pages *and* the detail pages. Yay convenience!

* I thought y'all said properties wouldn't display if they weren't there, but I see a label for name and no value? Please advise, I may have misunderstood. see attached screenshot.
* create time label should be Creation time

SO CLOSE!!!
Fixed in https://github.com/eucalyptus/koala/commit/6316da12ddb6af9e7e1776a53f4eaef0dd3ddd01 (pushed directly to 'develop' branch since they were so trivial)
Name field for unnamed volume is displaying vol-id as value now, instead of just not displaying. see attached screenshot.
Noted that we won't need to display the 'Name' field in the list of properties, since it's in the breadcrumb title.
Fixed by removing the name field -- https://github.com/eucalyptus/koala/commit/a09c17d0592cb48ad
